title: Writing About Technology
description: Write about your relationship with technology and how it affects your daily life.

prompt.description: Write about how you use technology in your daily life. Discuss both the positive and negative aspects of technology, and explain what you do to maintain a healthy balance.
requirements: Describe how you use technology daily
Mention at least two advantages of technology
Mention at least one disadvantage or concern
Explain what you do to maintain balance
Use passive voice at least twice

exampleSentences.sentence: Technology is used in almost every aspect of my daily life.
exampleSentences.translation: 기술은 제 일상생활의 거의 모든 면에서 사용됩니다.
exampleSentences.useCase: To introduce the topic with passive voice

exampleSentences.sentence: I couldn't imagine living without my smartphone.
exampleSentences.translation: 스마트폰 없이 사는 것은 상상할 수 없어요.

exampleSentences.sentence: One of the main advantages is that information can be accessed instantly.
exampleSentences.translation: 주요 장점 중 하나는 정보에 즉시 접근할 수 있다는 것이에요.
exampleSentences.useCase: To describe an advantage with passive voice

exampleSentences.sentence: However, I sometimes feel overwhelmed by constant notifications.
exampleSentences.translation: 하지만 끊임없는 알림에 압도당하는 느낌이 들 때가 있어요.

exampleSentences.sentence: To maintain balance, I try to set limits on my screen time.
exampleSentences.translation: 균형을 유지하기 위해 화면 시청 시간에 제한을 두려고 해요.
exampleSentences.useCase: To explain a strategy for balance

exampleSentences.sentence: Overall, I believe technology improves our lives when used wisely.
exampleSentences.translation: 전반적으로, 현명하게 사용하면 기술이 우리 삶을 향상시킨다고 생각해요.

vocabularyHelp.example: I use several devices throughout the day.
I try to limit my screen time to two hours.
I turned off notifications to focus better.
Technology helps us connect with people worldwide.
Social media can be a major distraction.
Some apps have improved my productivity.
Finding balance is important in the digital age.
I sometimes do a digital detox on weekends.

usefulExpressions.expression: Technology plays a big role in...
usefulExpressions.usage: To introduce how technology affects something
usefulExpressions.example: Technology plays a big role in how I work and study.
One advantage is that we can work from anywhere.
I find it helpful when apps remind me of important tasks.
To avoid distractions, I turn off my phone during work.

usefulExpressions.expression: On one hand... On the other hand...
usefulExpressions.example: On one hand, social media connects us. On the other hand, it can be addictive.

items: Did you describe your daily technology use?
Did you mention at least two advantages?
Did you mention at least one disadvantage?
Did you explain how you maintain balance?
Did you use passive voice at least twice?
Did you use passive voice correctly?
Did you use a variety of tenses appropriately?
Did you organize your ideas logically?
Did you use linking words to connect ideas?
Did you use varied vocabulary (avoid repetition)?
Is your writing at least 130 words?
Is your writing no more than 180 words?
Does your writing have a clear introduction and conclusion?
Did you complete within the time limit?
